Hillary Clinton: s accusation: In her campaign speech, Hillary Clinton accused Donald Trump of wanting to reverse the Supreme Court decision on same-sex marriage. This statement serves as the initial claim that needs to be verified for authenticity.
Trump: s evolving stance: The expert also took into account Trump's statement about evolving on the issue and his indication that he was "just for traditional marriage." This suggests that Trump's views may have shifted over time, but he still maintained opposition to same-sex marriage.
